title: Flashmob Ogive
question_text:
Flash mobs are a fun internet phenomenon and pop songs are featured in many of them. The ogive below displays the number of practices that $25\text{ employees}$ in a small business attended before the debut of a recent flash mob.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

Which of the following statements can be justified by the graph?
